title: Why did the pirates of the 17th and 18th centuries not wear helmets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Howdy, First…you did not want a fight. Black or red flag…a cannon shot or two across their bow. And done. Do not kill the crew or passengers! Let them live to spread the news. BIG BAD PIRATES!!!! Fighting cost money, arms/legs…and could get you sunk!!!! Really bad day!!
